title: Lightning Magic Sound Pack
description: The Lightning Magic Sound Pack offers energetic electricity casts, impacts, explosions, and more that will add an abundance of movement and life to your groundbreaking stories.
longDescription:
CLICK HERE for the preview video

FREE SAMPLES of this pack HERE


COMPLIMENT YOUR PROJECT’S ENERGY, MOVEMENT, AND LIFE WITH A SINGLE SOLUTION!


Free sound sources are never tailored to your specific project and lack the quality, consistency, and variety of a pre-made sound pack.


Save time while maintaining excellence with the Lightning Magic Sound Pack. The CASTS, IMPACTS, EXPLOSIONS, AND MORE within this pack come processed and designed specifically to fit directly into your project, saving you hours worth of manipulating free sound effects when you’re already on a tight deadline. On top of that, this pack is fully Universal Category System (UCS) compliant making it easy to organize and implement these sounds into your library.

Gift your groundbreaking creations an abundance of energy with electrifying audio that will send a shock of life to your visuals!


Discover

·       320 sound effects that can be imported directly into any project

·       Super HQ audio recorded and delivered at 96kHz, 24bit

·       Well-organized and easy-to-find sounds with richly embedded metadata (UCS, Soundminer, Basehead, Soundly, etc.)


Sounds Included:

Spell Casts (171 files total)

Explosions (28 files total)

Impacts (38 files total)

Pass-Bys/Whooshes (56 files total)


Find the complete asset list HERE
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Waves: 320

Number of Audio Cues: 320

Sample rate and bit depth: 96kHz & 24bit

Do Sound FX Loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 00 hours 10 minutes 57 seconds

Supported Development Platforms: ALL

Documentation: Asset list (see link above)
